law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Trading stamp" means a stamp or other similar device issued in connection with the retail sale of goods or services, as a cash discount or for any other marketing purpose, that is redeemable for cash, goods, or services.

"Trading stamp" does not include a redeemable device that:
a manufacturer or packer of an article uses to advertise or sell the article; or
a magazine, newspaper, or other publication issues and redeems.

text.section:
"Trading stamp company" means a person who, in any way:
distributes trading stamps for retail issuance by others; or
redeems trading stamps for retailers.
